document.full_text: charlie davies, 24, a forward for the united states national soccer team at the time of his accident in october 2009, has not played in a top-flight game in nearly a year and a half.
document.title: davies resolved to rebuild a career
lines_and_colors: charlie davies, 24, a forward for the united states national soccer team at the time of his accident in october 2009, has not played in a top-flight game in nearly a year and a half.
